fileDesc.titleStmt: Ad principem ineruditum Machine readable text Plutarch Gregorius N. Bernardakis&responsibility;&fund.NEH;

perie/ principem *i)neriiditiim. koyen: o( d' e)k filosofi/as tw=| a)/rxonti pa/redros kai\ fu/lac e)gkatoikisqei\s lo/gos, w(/sper eu)eci/as th=s duna/mews to\ e)pisfale\s a)fairw=n, a)polei/pei to\ u(giai=non.

a)lla\ nou=n ou)k e)/xontes oi( polloi\ tw=n basile/wn kai\ a)rxo/ntwn mimou=ntai tou\s a)te/xnous a)ndriantopoiou/s, oi(\ nomi/zousi mega/lous kai\ a(drou\s fai/nesqai fainei=sqai Madvigius tou\s kolossou/s, a)

kai\ gh=n pe/ric e)/xonq' u(grai=s e)n a)gka/lais e)/xonta au)tai=s a)gka/lais mei;
o( me
 kaqi/hsin a)rxa\s sperma/twn proshko/ntwn gh= d' a)nadi/dwsin, au)/cetai de\ ta\ me
 o)/mbrois ta\ d' a)ne/mois ta\ d' a)/strois e)piqalpo/mena kai\ selh/nh|, kosmei= d' h(/lios a(/panta kai\ pa=si tou=to dh\ to\ par' au(tou= au)tou= *: au)tou= fi/ltron e)gkera/nnusin. a)lla\ tw=n toiou/twn toiou/twn *: tosou/twn cf. Stob. 46, 101 kai\ thlikou/twn a(\ qeoi\ xari/zontai dw/rwn kai\ a)gaqw=n ou)k e)/stin a)po/lausis ou)de\ xrh=sis o)rqh\ di/xa no/mou kai\ di/khs kai\ a)/rxontos. di/kh me
 ou)=n no/mou te/los e)sti/, no/mos d' a)/rxontos e)/rgon, a)/rxwn d' ei)kw
 qeou= tou= pa/nta kosmou=ntos, ou) *feidi/ou deo/menos pla/ttontos ou)de\ *poluklei/tou kai\ *mu/rwnos, a)ll' au)to\s au(to
 ei)s o(moio/thta qew=| di' a)reth=s kaqista\s; kai\ dhmiourgw=n a)galma/twn to\ h(\diston o)fqh=nai kai\ qeoprepe/staton. oi(=on d' h(\lion e)n ou)ranw=| perikalle\s ei)/dwlon e(autou= kai\ selh/nhn o(. qeo\s e)ni/druse, toiou=ton e)n po/lesi mi/mhma kai\ fe/ggos a)/rxwn o(/ste qeoudh\s eu)diki/as; a)ne/xh|si cf. Hom. t 109. 111, toute/sti qeou= lo/gon e)/xwn dia/noian kai\ dia/noian R, sed recte se habet vulgata, ou) skh=ptron ou)de\ kerauno
 ou)de\ tri/ainan, w(s e)/nioi pla/ttousin e(autou\s kai\ gra/fousi tw=| a)nefi/ktw| poiou=ntes e)pi/fqonon to\ a)no/hton nemesa=| ga o( qeo\s toi=s
a)pomimoume/nois bronta\s kai\ keraunou\s kai\ a)ktinoboli/as, tou\s de\ th

 d' au)th=s kai\ to\ a)rxo/menon.

 diagnoi/hs to\ a)ke/raion kai\ kai\] h)\ Coraes peponhko/s, a)ll' o(/tan e)gxe/h|s, fai/netai to\ r(e/on ou(/tws; ai( saqrai\ yuxai\ ta\s e)cousi/as mh\ ste/gousai r(e/ousin e)/cw tai=s e)piqumi/ais, tai=s o)rgai=s, tai=s a)lazonei/ais, tai=s a)peirokali/ais kai/toi kai/toi R: kai\ ti/ dei= tau=ta le/gein, o(/pou kai\ ta\ smikro/tata tw=n e)lleimma/twn peri\ tou\s e)pifanei=s kai\ e)ndo/cous sukofantei=tai; *ki/mwnos h)=n o( oi)=nos diabolh/, *skipi/wnos o( u(/pnos, *leu/kollos e)pi\ tw=| deipnei=n polutele/steron h)/koue kakw=s.
